entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
